__e: Every week I tell you the same shit, and every week you forget half of what I say.
I just don't want my son to forget my voice.
No, I just don't want my son to forget my voice.
The next time you forget something, you're gonna be on your own.
So what if you leave something?
Right then, I'll be off - unless there's anything else I'm forgetting?
So why don't you do yourself a favor and just forget the past.
Well, I said I am beginning to think you are forgetting my name on purpose.
If you survive, you can clear up your father's wrongful death.
If you don't like the way things are, then forget me.
When your wife and daughter are here you forget about me.
Why don't you forget about me like I've already forgotten about you?
There's nothing to it, once you're up, I mean, you forget you're in the air.
Let me out of here before I forget I'm a lady.
For the safety of the boy, you should go home now and forget you were here.
it's...you know when you haven't had sex for a long time and you forget how good it is, and so you want it less?
When your wife and daughter are here you forget about me.
Why don't you forget about me like I've already forgotten about you?
Well, maybe you've forgotten that I was the one who took the hottest girl in school to the prom.
Yeah, well, I think sometimes people forget that I was the first female president.
You know, I hope you don't forget that I'm still part of yours, because, baby, you're still most of mine.
You know, I hope you don't forget that I'm still part of yours, because, baby, you're still most of mine.
No, something good happens and you feel better and you forget that you feel better 'cause it was something--
One of the things that happens when I stay away is that you forget you don't have the power to fix everything.
Never forget that our enemies have someone just like you... someone just like me... doing exactly the same thing as we speak.
I love you with all my heart and I bid you never forget it.
I'll make sure you never forget her. And what she did for you.
